mapper.select: SELECT com_no , com_category , b.comm_nm as com_category_nm , com_title , com_id , com_content , com_attach , com_pass , TO_CHAR(com_reg_date,'YYYY.MM.DD') AS com_reg_date , TO_CHAR(com_mod_date,'YYYY.MM.DD') AS com_reg_date FROM community a, comm_code b where a.com_category = b.comm_cd
